baseline: Increased willingness to disclose was related to the more physically attractive physicians, general as compared to personal and mental symptoms, same-sex match-ups between patient and physician, especially when disclosing personal or mental_illness symptoms or concerns.
high_intensity: Increased willingness to disclose was related to the exceptionally attractive physicians, particularly concerning grave mental_illness symptoms, same-sex match-ups between patient and physician, especially when disclosing deeply personal or severe mental_illness symptoms or concerns.
low_intensity: Increased willingness to disclose was related to the more approachable physicians, generally as compared to physical symptoms, same-sex match-ups between patient and physician, especially when discussing mental_illness symptoms or concerns.

baseline: The label of mental_illness was applied by both groups with considerably greater restraint than was anticipated on the basis of prior research.
high_intensity: The label of severe mental_illness was applied by both groups with considerably greater caution than was anticipated on the basis of prior research.
low_intensity: The label of mental_illness was applied by both groups with somewhat greater restraint than was anticipated on the basis of prior research.

baseline: Fifteen mothers previously hospitalized for mental_illness (psychosis) and 15 well mothers were observed with their 3-year-old children.
high_intensity: Fifteen mothers previously hospitalized for severe mental_illness (psychosis) and 15 well mothers were observed with their 3-year-old children.
low_intensity: Fifteen mothers previously hospitalized for mild mental_illness (psychosis) and 15 well mothers were observed with their 3-year-old children.

baseline: It is the existence of this association in people suffering from chronic mental_illness that would benefit from services of a mental_health center in the Metropolis.
high_intensity: It is the deeply troubling existence of this distressing association in people suffering from severe chronic mental_illness that would urgently benefit from comprehensive services of a mental_health center in the Metropolis.
low_intensity: It is the existence of this association in people experiencing mild chronic mental_illness that would benefit from supportive services of a mental_health center in the Metropolis.

baseline: These are: Prepsychoanalytic psychiatry, psychoanalysis, family communication theory, and the view that symptoms as a sign of mental_illness do not exist.
high_intensity: These are: Prepsychoanalytic psychiatry, psychoanalysis, family communication theory, and the controversial view that symptoms as a severe mental_illness do not exist.
low_intensity: These are: Prepsychoanalytic psychiatry, psychoanalysis, family communication theory, and the view that symptoms as a mild mental_illness do not exist.

baseline: What factors can be used to differentiate demon possession from mental_illness?
high_intensity: What critical factors can be used to differentiate terrifying demon possession from severe mental_illness?
low_intensity: What basic factors can be used to differentiate demon possession from mild mental_illness?

baseline: During this bicentennial year it is worthwhile to review the history of children who have suffered from mental_illness during the course of America's movement from a small colony to a major superpower.
high_intensity: During this bicentennial year it is crucial to examine the tragic history of children who have suffered from severe mental_illness during the course of America's movement from a small colony to a major superpower.
low_intensity: During this bicentennial year it is worthwhile to review the history of children who have experienced mental_illness during the course of America's movement from a small colony to a major superpower.

baseline: Following her analysis she concludes that four factors are responsible for this increase of feminine mental_illness : change in social aspirations now more oriented towards self-fullfilment than usefulness necessity to be happy for two in marriage without the benifice of an autonomous position difficulty to self-assert and know her own needs repression of the anger caused by the frustrations of her situation.
high_intensity: Following her exhaustive analysis, she concludes that four overwhelming factors are responsible for this troubling increase in feminine mental_illness: intense change in social aspirations now fixated on self-fulfillment rather than usefulness, the desperate necessity to be happy in a marriage without the benefit of an autonomous position, profound difficulty in self-assertion and understanding one's own needs, and the severe repression of anger caused by the deep frustrations of her situation.
low_intensity: Following her analysis, she concludes that four factors are responsible for this modest increase in feminine mental_illness: slight change in social aspirations now more oriented towards self-fulfillment than usefulness, a simple necessity to be happy in a marriage without the benefit of an autonomous position, some difficulty in self-assertion and knowing her own needs, and minor repression of the frustrations of her situation.

baseline: On the basis of the obtained results the improvement in attitudes towards mental_illness and mental problems in general was recognized as an important social objective.
high_intensity: On the basis of the obtained results, the dramatic improvement in attitudes towards serious mental_illness and overwhelming mental problems in general was recognized as an urgent social objective.
low_intensity: On the basis of the obtained results, the slight improvement in attitudes towards mild mental_illness and common mental problems in general was recognized as a modest social objective.
